metadata.title: Tuesday, 17th June, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Health what measures the Government has taken to make the country epidemic prepared.

parts: (a) why the following schools, which were upgraded from primary to secondary, in Kalabo Central Parliamentary Constituency in 2023, did not have secondary school teachers, as of May, 2024:
(b) when the teachers will be deployed to the schools above.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a Youth Skills Development Training Centre in Chadiza District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a police post in Munkonge Chiefdom in Kasama District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the time frame for completion of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Fisheries and Livestock what the total number of livestock in the following Wards in Dundumwezi Parliamentary Constituency was, as of April 2024
